0dbfs.descr: Sets the value of 0 decibels using full scale amplitude.
0dbfs.name: 0dbfs

ksmps.descr: Sets the number of samples in a control period.
ksmps.name: ksmps

nchnls.descr: Sets the number of channels of audio output.
nchnls.name: nchnls

nchnls_i.descr: Sets the number of channels of audio input.
nchnls_i.name: nchnls_i

endop.descr: Marks the end of an user-defined opcode block.
endop.name: endop

opcode.descr: Defines the start of user-defined opcode block.
opcode.name: opcode

#include.descr: Includes an external file for processing.
#include.name: #include

adsyn.descr: Output is an additive set of individually controlled sinusoids, using an oscillator bank.
adsyn.name: adsyn
adsyn.syntax: ares adsyn kamod, kfmod, ksmod, ifilcod

adsynt.descr: Performs additive synthesis with an arbitrary number of partials, not necessarily harmonic.
adsynt.name: adsynt
adsynt.syntax: ares adsynt kamp, kcps, iwfn, ifreqfn, iampfn, icnt [, iphs]

adsynt2.descr: Performs additive synthesis with an arbitrary number of partials -not necessarily harmonic- with interpolation.
adsynt2.name: adsynt2
adsynt2.syntax: ar adsynt2 kamp, kcps, iwfn, ifreqfn, iampfn, icnt [, iphs]

hsboscil.descr: An oscillator which takes tonality and brightness as arguments.
hsboscil.name: hsboscil
hsboscil.syntax: ares hsboscil kamp, ktone, kbrite, ibasfreq, iwfn, ioctfn  [, ioctcnt] [, iphs]

lfo.descr: A low frequency oscillator of various shapes.
lfo.name: lfo

oscbnk.descr: Mixes the output of any number of oscillators.
oscbnk.name: oscbnk
oscbnk.syntax: ares oscbnk kcps, kamd, kfmd, kpmd, iovrlap, iseed, kl1minf, kl1maxf,  kl2minf, kl2maxf, ilfomode, keqminf, keqmaxf, keqminl, keqmaxl,  keqminq, keqmaxq, ieqmode, kfn [, il1fn] [, il2fn] [, ieqffn]  [, ieqlfn] [, ieqqfn] [, itabl] [, ioutfn]

oscil.name: oscil
oscil.syntax: ares oscil xamp, xcps, ifn [, iphs]

oscil3.descr: A simple oscillator with cubic interpolation.
oscil3.name: oscil3
oscil3.syntax: ares oscil3 xamp, xcps, ifn [, iphs]

oscili.descr: A simple oscillator with linear interpolation.
oscili.name: oscili
oscili.syntax: ares oscili xamp, xcps, ifn [, iphs]

oscilikt.descr: A linearly interpolated oscillator that allows changing the table number at k-rate.
oscilikt.name: oscilikt
oscilikt.syntax: ares oscilikt xamp, xcps, kfn [, iphs] [, istor]

osciliktp.descr: A linearly interpolated oscillator that allows allows phase modulation.
osciliktp.name: osciliktp
osciliktp.syntax: ares osciliktp kcps, kfn, kphs [, istor]

oscilikts.descr: A linearly interpolated oscillator with sync status that allows changing the table number at k-rate.
oscilikts.name: oscilikts
oscilikts.syntax: ares oscilikts xamp, xcps, kfn, async, kphs [, istor]

osciln.descr: Accesses table values at a user-defined frequency.
osciln.name: osciln
osciln.syntax: ares osciln kamp, ifrq, ifn, itimes

oscilx.descr: (same as osciln) Accesses table values at a user-defined frequency.
oscilx.name: oscilx
oscilx.syntax: ares osciln kamp, ifrq, ifn, itimes

oscils.name: oscils
oscils.syntax: ares oscils iamp, icps, iphs [, iflg]

poscil.name: poscil
poscil.syntax: ares poscil aamp, acps, ifn [, iphs]

poscil3.descr: High precision oscillator with cubic interpolation.
poscil3.name: poscil3
poscil3.syntax: ares poscil3 aamp, acps, ifn [, iphs]

vibrato.name: vibrato
vibrato.syntax: kout vibrato kAverageAmp, kAverageFreq, kRandAmountAmp, kRandAmountFreq, kAmpMinRate, kAmpMaxRate, kcpsMinRate, kcpsMaxRate, ifn [, iphs

buzz.descr: Output is a set of harmonically related sine partials.
buzz.name: buzz
buzz.syntax: ares buzz xamp, xcps, knh, ifn [, iphs]

gbuzz.descr: Output is a set of harmonically related cosine partials.
gbuzz.name: gbuzz
gbuzz.syntax: ares gbuzz xamp, xcps, knh, klh, kmul, ifn [, iphs]

vco.descr: Implementation of a band limited, analog modeled oscillator.
vco.name: vco
vco.syntax: ares vco xamp, xcps, iwave, kpw [, ifn] [, imaxd] [, ileak] [, inyx]  [, iphs] [, iskip]

vco2.descr: Implementation of a band-limited oscillator using pre-calculated tables.
vco2.name: vco2
vco2.syntax: ares vco2 kamp, kcps [, imode] [, kpw] [, kphs] [, inyx]

vco2ft.descr: Returns a table number at k-time for a given oscillator frequency and wavform.
vco2ft.name: vco2ft

vco2ift.descr: Returns a table number at i-time for a given oscillator frequency and wavform.
vco2ift.name: vco2ift

vco2init.descr: Calculates tables for use by vco2 opcode.
vco2init.name: vco2init
vco2init.syntax: ifn vco2init iwave [, ibasfn] [, ipmul] [, iminsiz] [, imaxsiz] [, isrcft]

crossfm.descr: Two mutually frequency and/or phase modulated oscillators.
crossfm.name: crossfm
crossfm.syntax: a1, a2 crossfm xfrq1, xfrq2, xndx1, xndx2, kcps, ifn1, ifn2 [, iphs1] [, iphs2]

crossfmi.descr: Two mutually frequency and/or phase modulated oscillators.
crossfmi.name: crossfmi
crossfmi.syntax: a1, a2 crossfmi xfrq1, xfrq2, xndx1, xndx2, kcps, ifn1, ifn2 [, iphs1] [, iphs2]

crosspm.descr: Two mutually frequency and/or phase modulated oscillators.
crosspm.name: crosspm
crosspm.syntax: a1, a2 crosspm xfrq1, xfrq2, xndx1, xndx2, kcps, ifn1, ifn2 [, iphs1] [, iphs2]

crosspmi.descr: Two mutually frequency and/or phase modulated oscillators.
crosspmi.name: crosspmi
crosspmi.syntax: a1, a2 crosspmi xfrq1, xfrq2, xndx1, xndx2, kcps, ifn1, ifn2 [, iphs1] [, iphs2]

crossfmpm.descr: Two mutually frequency and/or phase modulated oscillators.
crossfmpm.name: crossfmpm
crossfmpm.syntax: a1, a2 crossfmpm xfrq1, xfrq2, xndx1, xndx2, kcps, ifn1, ifn2 [, iphs1] [, iphs2]

crossfmpmi.descr: Two mutually frequency and/or phase modulated oscillators.
crossfmpmi.name: crossfmpmi
crossfmpmi.syntax: a1, a2 crossfmpmi xfrq1, xfrq2, xndx1, xndx2, kcps, ifn1, ifn2 [, iphs1] [, iphs2]

fmb3.descr: Uses FM synthesis to create a Hammond B3 organ sound.
fmb3.name: fmb3
fmb3.syntax: ares fmb3 kamp, kfreq, kc1, kc2, kvdepth, kvrate, ifn1, ifn2, ifn3,  ifn4, ivfn

fmbell.descr: Uses FM synthesis to create a tublar bell sound.
fmbell.name: fmbell
fmbell.syntax: ares fmbell kamp, kfreq, kc1, kc2, kvdepth, kvrate, ifn1, ifn2, ifn3,  ifn4, ivfn[, isus]

fmmetal.descr: Uses FM synthesis to create a
fmmetal.name: fmmetal
fmmetal.syntax: ares fmmetal kamp, kfreq, kc1, kc2, kvdepth, kvrate, ifn1, ifn2, ifn3,  ifn4, ivfn

fmpercfl.descr: Uses FM synthesis to create a percussive flute sound.
fmpercfl.name: fmpercfl
fmpercfl.syntax: ares fmpercfl kamp, kfreq, kc1, kc2, kvdepth, kvrate, ifn1, ifn2,  ifn3, ifn4, ivfn

fmrhode.descr: Uses FM synthesis to create a Fender Rhodes electric piano sound.
fmrhode.name: fmrhode
fmrhode.syntax: ares fmrhode kamp, kfreq, kc1, kc2, kvdepth, kvrate, ifn1, ifn2,  ifn3, ifn4, ivfn

fmvoice.name: fmvoice
fmvoice.syntax: ares fmvoice kamp, kfreq, kvowel, ktilt, kvibamt, kvibrate, ifn1,  ifn2, ifn3, ifn4, ivibfn

fmwurlie.descr: Uses FM synthesis to create a Wurlitzer electric piano sound.
fmwurlie.name: fmwurlie
fmwurlie.syntax: ares fmwurlie kamp, kfreq, kc1, kc2, kvdepth, kvrate, ifn1, ifn2, ifn3,  ifn4, ivfn

foscil.name: foscil
foscil.syntax: ares foscil xamp, kcps, xcar, xmod, kndx, ifn [, iphs]

foscili.descr: Basic frequency modulated oscillator with linear interpolation.
foscili.name: foscili
foscili.syntax: ares foscili xamp, kcps, xcar, xmod, kndx, ifn [, iphs]

diskgrain.descr: Synchronous granular synthesis, using a soundfile as source.
diskgrain.name: diskgrain
diskgrain.syntax: asig diskgrain Sfname, kamp, kfreq, kpitch, kgrsize, kprate,  ifun, iolaps [,imaxgrsize , ioffset]

fof.descr: Produces sinusoid bursts useful for formant and granular synthesis.
fof.name: fof
fof.syntax: ares fof xamp, xfund, xform, koct, kband, kris, kdur, kdec, iolaps,  ifna, ifnb, itotdur [, iphs] [, ifmode] [, iskip]

fof2.descr: Produces sinusoid bursts including k-rate incremental indexing with each successive burst.
fof2.name: fof2
fof2.syntax: ares fof2 xamp, xfund, xform, koct, kband, kris, kdur, kdec, iolaps,  ifna, ifnb, itotdur, kphs, kgliss [, iskip]

fog.descr: Audio output is a succession of grains derived from data in a stored function table
fog.name: fog
fog.syntax: ares fog xamp, xdens, xtrans, aspd, koct, kband, kris, kdur, kdec,  iolaps, ifna, ifnb, itotdur [, iphs] [, itmode] [, iskip]

grain.name: grain
grain.syntax: ares grain xamp, xpitch, xdens, kampoff, kpitchoff, kgdur, igfn,  iwfn, imgdur [, igrnd]

grain2.name: grain2
grain2.syntax: ares grain2 kcps, kfmd, kgdur, iovrlp, kfn, iwfn [, irpow]  [, iseed] [, imode]

grain3.descr: Generate granular synthesis textures with more user control.
grain3.name: grain3
grain3.syntax: ares grain3 kcps, kphs, kfmd, kpmd, kgdur, kdens, imaxovr, kfn, iwfn,  kfrpow, kprpow [, iseed] [, imode]

granule.descr: A more complex granular synthesis texture generator.
granule.name: granule
granule.syntax: ares granule xamp, ivoice, iratio, imode, ithd, ifn, ipshift, igskip,  igskip_os, ilength, kgap, igap_os, kgsize, igsize_os, iatt, idec  [, iseed] [, ipitch1] [, ipitch2] [, ipitch3] [, ipitch4] [, ifnenv]

partikkel.descr: Granular synthesizer with per grain control over many of its parameters. Has a sync input to sychronize its internal grain scheduler clock to an external clock source.
partikkel.name: partikkel
partikkel.syntax: a1 [, a2, a3, a4, a5, a6, a7, a8] partikkel agrainfreq,  kdistribution, idisttab, async, kenv2amt, ienv2tab, ienv_attack,  ienv_decay, ksustain_amount, ka_d_ratio, kduration, kamp, igainmasks,  kwavfreq, ksweepshape, iwavfreqstarttab, iwavfreqendtab, awavfm,  ifmamptab, kfmenv, icosine, ktraincps, knumpartials, kchroma,  ichannelmasks, krandommask, kwaveform1, kwaveform2, kwaveform3,  kwaveform4, iwaveamptab, asamplepos1, asamplepos2, asamplepos3,  asamplepos4, kwavekey1, kwavekey2, kwavekey3, kwavekey4, imax_grains  [, iopcode_id]

sndwarp.descr: Reads a mono sound sample from a table and applies time-stretching and/or pitch modification.
sndwarp.name: sndwarp
sndwarp.syntax: ares [, ac] sndwarp xamp, xtimewarp, xresample, ifn1, ibeg, iwsize,  irandw, ioverlap, ifn2, itimemode

sndwarpst.descr: Reads a stereo sound sample from a table and applies time-stretching and/or pitch modification.
sndwarpst.name: sndwarpst
sndwarpst.syntax: ar1, ar2 [,ac1] [, ac2] sndwarpst xamp, xtimewarp, xresample, ifn1,  ibeg, iwsize, irandw, ioverlap, ifn2, itimemode

syncgrain.name: syncgrain
syncgrain.syntax: asig syncgrain kamp, kfreq, kpitch, kgrsize, kprate, ifun1,  ifun2, iolaps

syncloop.name: syncloop
syncloop.syntax: asig syncloop kamp, kfreq, kpitch, kgrsize, kprate, klstart,  klend, ifun1, ifun2, iolaps[,istart, iskip]

vosim.descr: Simple vocal simulation based on glottal pulses with formant characteristics.
vosim.name: vosim
vosim.syntax: ar vosim kamp, kFund, kForm, kDecay, kPulseCount, kPulseFactor, ifn [, iskip]

hvs1.descr: Allows one-dimensional Hyper Vectorial Synthesis (HVS) controlled by externally-updated k-variables.
hvs1.name: hvs1
hvs1.syntax: hvs1 kx, inumParms, inumPointsX, iOutTab, iPositionsTab, iSnapTab [, iConfigTab]

hvs2.descr: Allows two-dimensional Hyper Vectorial Synthesis (HVS) controlled by externally-updated k-variables.
hvs2.name: hvs2
hvs2.syntax: hvs2 kx, ky, inumParms, inumPointsX, inumPointsY, iOutTab, iPositionsTab, iSnapTab [, iConfigTab]

hvs3.descr: Allows three-dimensional Hyper Vectorial Synthesis (HVS) controlled by externally-updated k-variables.
hvs3.name: hvs3
hvs3.syntax: hvs3 kx, ky, kz, inumParms, inumPointsX, inumPointsY, inumPointsZ, iOutTab, iPositionsTab, iSnapTab [, iConfigTab]

expcurve.descr: This opcode implements a formula for generating a normalised exponential curve in range 0 - 1. It is based on the Max / MSP work of Eric Singer (c) 1994.
expcurve.name: expcurve

expon.descr: Trace an exponential curve between specified points.
expon.name: expon

expseg.descr: Trace a series of exponential segments between specified points.
expseg.name: expseg
expseg.syntax: ares expseg ia, idur1, ib [, idur2] [, ic] [...]

expsega.descr: An exponential segment generator operating at a-rate.
expsega.name: expsega
expsega.syntax: ares expsega ia, idur1, ib [, idur2] [, ic] [...]

expsegb.descr: Trace a series of exponential segments between specified absolute points.
expsegb.name: expsegb
expsegb.syntax: ares expsegb ia, itim1, ib [, itim2] [, ic] [...]

expsegba.descr: An exponential segment generator operating at a-rate with absolute times.
expsegba.name: expsegba
expsegba.syntax: ares expsegba ia, itim1, ib [, itim2] [, ic] [...]

expsegr.descr: Trace a series of exponential segments between specified points including a release segment.
expsegr.name: expsegr
expsegr.syntax: ares expsegr ia, idur1, ib [, idur2] [, ic] [...], irel, iz

gainslider.descr: An implementation of a logarithmic gain curve which is similar to the gainslider~ object from Cycling 74 Max / MSP.
gainslider.name: gainslider

line.descr: Trace a straight line between specified points.
line.name: line

linseg.descr: Trace a series of line segments between specified points.
linseg.name: linseg
linseg.syntax: ares linseg ia, idur1, ib [, idur2] [, ic] [...]

linsegb.descr: Trace a series of line segments between specified absolute points.
linsegb.name: linsegb
linsegb.syntax: ares linsegb ia, itim1, ib [, itim2] [, ic] [...]

linsegr.descr: Trace a series of line segments between specified points including a release segment.
linsegr.name: linsegr
linsegr.syntax: ares linsegr ia, idur1, ib [, idur2] [, ic] [...], irel, iz

logcurve.descr: This opcode implements a formula for generating a normalised logarithmic curve in range 0 - 1. It is based on the Max / MSP work of Eric Singer (c) 1994.
logcurve.name: logcurve

loopseg.descr: Generate control signal consisting of linear segments delimited by two or more specified points.
loopseg.name: loopseg
loopseg.syntax: ksig loopseg kfreq, ktrig, ktime0, kvalue0 [, ktime1] [, kvalue1]  [, ktime2] [, kvalue2] [...]

loopsegp.descr: Control signals based on linear segments.
loopsegp.name: loopsegp
loopsegp.syntax: ksig loopsegp kphase, kvalue0, kdur0, kvalue1  [, kdur1, ... , kdurN-1, kvalueN]

looptseg.descr: Generate control signal consisting of exponential or linear segments delimited by two or more specified points.
looptseg.name: looptseg
looptseg.syntax: ksig looptseg kfreq, ktrig, ktime0, kvalue0, ktype0, [, ktime1] [, kvalue1] [,ktype1]  [, ktime2] [, kvalue2] [,ktype2] [...]

loopxseg.descr: Generate control signal consisting of exponential segments delimited by two or more specified points.
loopxseg.name: loopxseg
loopxseg.syntax: ksig loopxseg kfreq, ktrig, ktime0, kvalue0 [, ktime1] [, kvalue1]  [, ktime2] [, kvalue2] [...]

lpshold.descr: Generate control signal consisting of held segments.
lpshold.name: lpshold
lpshold.syntax: ksig lpshold kfreq, ktrig, ktime0, kvalue0 [, ktime1] [, kvalue1]  [, ktime2] [, kvalue2] [...]

lpsholdp.descr: Control signals based on held segments.
lpsholdp.name: lpsholdp
lpsholdp.syntax: ksig lpsholdp kphase, ktrig, ktime0, kvalue0 [, ktime1] [, kvalue1]  [, ktime2] [, kvalue2] [...]

rspline.name: rspline
rspline.syntax: ares rspline xrangeMin, xrangeMax, kcpsMin, kcpsMax

transeg.name: transeg
transeg.syntax: ares transeg ia, idur, itype, ib [, idur2] [, itype] [, ic] ...

transegb.descr: Constructs a user-definable envelope in absolute time.
transegb.name: transegb
transegb.syntax: ares transegb ia, itim, itype, ib [, itim2] [, itype] [, ic] ...

transegr.descr: Constructs a user-definable envelope with extended release segment.
transegr.name: transegr
transegr.syntax: ares transegr ia, idur, itype, ib [, idur2] [, itype] [, ic] ...

adsr.descr: Calculates the classical ADSR envelope using linear segments.
adsr.name: adsr
adsr.syntax: ares adsr iatt, idec, islev, irel [, idel]

envlpx.descr: Applies an envelope consisting of 3 segments.
envlpx.name: envlpx
envlpx.syntax: ares envlpx xamp, irise, idur, idec, ifn, iatss, iatdec [, ixmod]

envlpxr.name: envlpxr
envlpxr.syntax: ares envlpxr xamp, irise, idec, ifn, iatss, iatdec [, ixmod] [,irind]

linen.descr: Applies a straight line rise and decay pattern to an input amp signal.
linen.name: linen
linen.syntax: ares linen xamp, irise, idur, idec

linenr.name: linenr
linenr.syntax: ares linenr xamp, irise, idec, iatdec

madsr.descr: Calculates the classical ADSR envelope using the
madsr.name: madsr
madsr.syntax: ares madsr iatt, idec, islev, irel [, idel] [, ireltim]

mxadsr.descr: Calculates the classical ADSR envelope using the
mxadsr.name: mxadsr
mxadsr.syntax: ares mxadsr iatt, idec, islev, irel [, idel] [, ireltim]

xadsr.name: xadsr
xadsr.syntax: ares xadsr iatt, idec, islev, irel [, idel]

bamboo.descr: Semi-physical model of a bamboo sound.
bamboo.name: bamboo
bamboo.syntax: ares bamboo kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake] [, ifreq]  [, ifreq1] [, ifreq2]

barmodel.descr: Creates a tone similar to a struck metal bar.
barmodel.name: barmodel
barmodel.syntax: ares barmodel kbcL, kbcR, iK, ib, kscan, iT30, ipos, ivel, iwid

cabasa.descr: Semi-physical model of a cabasa sound.
cabasa.name: cabasa
cabasa.syntax: ares cabasa iamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]

chuap.descr: Simulates Chua's oscillator, an LRC oscillator with an active resistor, proved capable of bifurcation and chaotic attractors, with k-rate control of circuit elements.
chuap.name: chuap
chuap.syntax: aI3, aV2, aV1 chuap kL, kR0, kC1, kG, kGa, kGb, kE, kC2, iI3, iV2, iV1, ktime_step

crunch.descr: Semi-physical model of a crunch sound.
crunch.name: crunch
crunch.syntax: ares crunch iamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]

dripwater.descr: Semi-physical model of a water drop.
dripwater.name: dripwater
dripwater.syntax: ares dripwater kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake] [, ifreq]  [, ifreq1] [, ifreq2]

gendy.descr: Dynamic stochastic approach to waveform synthesis conceived by Iannis Xenakis.
gendy.name: gendy
gendy.syntax: ares gendy kamp, kampdist, kdurdist, kadpar, kddpar, kminfreq, kmaxfreq,  kampscl, kdurscl [, initcps] [, knum]

gendyc.descr: Dynamic stochastic approach to waveform synthesis using cubic interpolation.
gendyc.name: gendyc
gendyc.syntax: ares gendyc kamp, kampdist, kdurdist, kadpar, kddpar, kminfreq, kmaxfreq,  kampscl, kdurscl [, initcps] [, knum]

gendyx.descr: Variation of the dynamic stochastic approach to waveform synthesis conceived by Iannis Xenakis.
gendyx.name: gendyx
gendyx.syntax: ares gendyx kamp, kampdist, kdurdist, kadpar, kddpar, kminfreq, kmaxfreq,  kampscl, kdurscl, kcurveup, kcurvedown [, initcps] [, knum]

gogobel.descr: Audio output is a tone related to the striking of a cow bell or similar.
gogobel.name: gogobel
gogobel.syntax: ares gogobel kamp, kfreq, ihrd, ipos, imp, kvibf, kvamp, ivfn

guiro.descr: Semi-physical model of a guiro sound.
guiro.name: guiro
guiro.syntax: ares guiro kamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake] [, ifreq] [, ifreq1]

lorenz.descr: Implements the Lorenz system of equations.
lorenz.name: lorenz
lorenz.syntax: ax, ay, az lorenz ksv, krv, kbv, kh, ix, iy, iz, iskip [, iskipinit]

mandel.name: mandel
mandel.syntax: kiter, koutrig mandel ktrig, kx, ky, kmaxIter

mandol.name: mandol
mandol.syntax: ares mandol kamp, kfreq, kpluck, kdetune, kgain, ksize, ifn [, iminfreq]

marimba.descr: Physical model related to the striking of a wooden block.
marimba.name: marimba
marimba.syntax: ares marimba kamp, kfreq, ihrd, ipos, imp, kvibf, kvamp, ivibfn, idec  [, idoubles] [, itriples]

moog.descr: An emulation of a mini-Moog synthesizer.
moog.name: moog
moog.syntax: ares moog kamp, kfreq, kfiltq, kfiltrate, kvibf, kvamp, iafn, iwfn, ivfn

planet.descr: Simulates a planet orbiting in a binary star system.
planet.name: planet
planet.syntax: ax, ay, az planet kmass1, kmass2, ksep, ix, iy, iz, ivx, ivy, ivz, idelta  [, ifriction] [, iskip]

prepiano.descr: Creates a tone similar to a piano string prepared in a Cageian fashion.
prepiano.name: prepiano
prepiano.syntax: ares prepiano ifreq, iNS, iD, iK,  iT30,iB, kbcl, kbcr, imass, ifreq, iinit, ipos, ivel, isfreq,  isspread[, irattles, irubbers]

sandpaper.descr: Semi-physical model of a sandpaper sound.
sandpaper.name: sandpaper
sandpaper.syntax: ares sandpaper iamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]

sekere.descr: Semi-physical model of a sekere sound.
sekere.name: sekere
sekere.syntax: ares sekere iamp, idettack [, inum] [, idamp] [, imaxshake]

lua_ikopcall_off.name: lua_ikopcall_off

lua_iaopcall_off.descr: Calls a Lua opcode at i-rate only. Any number of output and/or input arguments may be passed. All arguments must be passed on the right-hand side. Outputs are returned in the argument.
lua_iaopcall_off.name: lua_iaopcall_off

lua_opdef.descr: Define an opcode in Lua at i-rate. The opcode can take any number of output and/or input arguments of any type.
